other_tests.findings: Elevated ventricular pacing threshold (2.75 V at 1.0 ms) and reduced sensing amplitude (5.6 mV); normal pacing impedances (403 Ohms).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Similar values had already been observed 2 months earlier during routine follow-up.

other_tests.findings: Perforation of the ICD lead into the pericardium.
